TOO "NUKER CORPORATION"

Nuker Corporation LLP was founded in 1996. The main activity is the development, production, and sale of power locking and sealing devices (ZPU), which are widely used as security devices for one-time use in rail freight, water and air transportation. The company is registered in the register of domestic producers of the National Welfare Fund group "Samruk Kazyna", has a certificate of origin of the goods in the form of ST KZ, confirming 95% of the Kazakh content.
